content: Christ is my Rock, my hope, my salvation,
I will not fear in tribulation,
He’s the foundation of my salvation,
Christ is my Rock, my salvation, my hope.
Christ is my Rock, my refuge and strength,
I will call on His name at length,
In times of trouble, He’s my defense,
Christ is my Rock, my refuge and strength.
When the storms of life are raging,
And my soul is in despair,
I will call upon His name,
He’s my refuge, He’s always there.
Christ is my Rock, my refuge and strength,
I will call on His name at length,
In times of trouble, He’s my defense,
Christ is my Rock, my refuge and strength.
Though the world may try to shake me,
And the waves of life may roar,
I will stand firm in His promise,
For He is my Rock evermore.
Christ is my Rock, my refuge and strength,
I will call on His name at length,
In times of trouble, He’s my defense,
Christ is my Rock, my refuge and strength.
